Name: acquired von Willebrand syndrome
Definition: A blood coagulation disease characterized by development of a defect in clotting in the absence of previous bleeding symptoms

Name: coagulation protein disease
Definition: An inherited blood coagulation disease that is characterized by easy bleeding

Name: hemorrhagic disease
Definition: An inherited blood coagulation disease that is characterized by easy bleeding

Name: blood platelet disease
Definition: An inherited blood coagulation disease characterized by autosomal recessive inheritance of mucosal bleeding

Name: thrombophilia
Definition: A disease of metabolism that has_material_basis_in excessive growth hormone production which results_in enlargement located_in limb.
